description: The Canadian Food Inspection has a requirement for the provision of multiple freezers.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* **Title**: Freezers
* **Reference Number**: cb-5564-14949210
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 2023-00406

### Tender Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has issued a tender for the provision of multiple ultra-cold or ultralow upright cabinets or freezers. This procurement appeal is held under the Supply Arrangement (SA), as per Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada

### Tender Schedule

* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-15
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-31T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-05-31

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-05
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Saifeldin Abdelhady
	+ Email: Saifeldin.Abdelhady@inspection.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 540-5433
* **Delivery Location**: Winnipeg

### Supporting Documents

* The tender notice and instructions to bidders can be found on the Government of Canada’s Buyandsell.gc.ca platform. Please click this [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5564/2023-00406-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp_1.pdf) to access the relevant documents.

### Important Notes

* This tender has expired; it is no longer open for bidding. For more information or to express interest, contact the Contracting Officer.

Note: “Buyandsell.gc.ca” is a protected Microsoft Azure address which I intentionally removed. You should insert that link accordingly.  [buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) would be a URL alternative. I reduced sentences and rephrased words wherever needed, to be clear
